snippet: Instead of dramatic new reforms, Chinese leaders are likely to emphasize reining in surging debt and financial risks to keep growth steady at this year's meeting of the ceremonial national legislature....

headline.main: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months
headline.print_headline: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months

lead_paragraph: Instead of dramatic new reforms, Chinese leaders are likely to emphasize reining in surging debt and financial risks to keep growth steady at this year's meeting of the ceremonial national legislature.
